Question: This person dropped out of college at the end of his first year (May 1960).
Hints: While in London, this person performed at several London folk clubs, including The Troubadour, Les Cousins, and Bunjies.
Between July 1984 and March 1985, this person recorded Empire Burlesque.
This person has continued to perform songs from his gospel albums in concert, occasionally covering traditional religious songs.
